action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Paris
TO: Dresden
BY: Taxi
CLASS: First
WHEN: At the end of next week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  Does the travel agent already know your origin? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know about it yet.
action.label: forget

action.content: Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please answer this question carefully. Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please follow my instructions. Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: The travel agent is not aware of the travel yet.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please be specific now. Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: The travel agent is aware of the destination, Dresden.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please think about it carefully. Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: Answer for TO invalid after max attempts.

probes.question: ME: Does the travel agent already know your origin? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know about it yet.

probes.question: ME: Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the travel agent how you are travelling, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the travel agent knows in which class the trip will happen? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Have you informed the travel agent about your dates? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
